lines.text:
[while eating a meal of feces]
Carlo, do this with your fingers.
[the President sticks two fingers in his mouth]
And say, "I can't eat rice with my fingers like this."

[with fingers in his mouth]
I can't eat rice.
Then eat shit.
We Fascists are the only true anarchists, naturally, once we're masters of the state. In fact, the one true anarchy is that of power.

[Renata is crying]
Are you crying for your mama? Come, I'll console you! Come here to me!

[singing]
Come, little darling to your good daddy / He'll sing you a lullaby
Heavens, what an opportunity you offer me. Sra Maggi's tale must be acted upon at once.
Sir, Sir. Pity. Respect my grief. I'm suffering so, at my mother's fate. She died for me and I'll never see her again.
Undress her.
Kill me! At least God, whom I implore, will pity me. Kill me, but don't dishonor me.
This whining's the most exciting thing I've ever heard.
[first lines]
[four men, sitting at a table, each sign a booklet]
Your Excellency.
Mr. President.
My lord.
All's good if it's excessive.
This howling is the most exciting thing I have ever heard.
It is not enough to kill the same person over and over again. It is far more recommendable to kill as many beings as possible.

It is when I see others degraded that I rejoice knowing it is better to be me than the scum of "the people". Whenever men are equal, without that difference, happiness cannot exist. So you wouldn't aid the humble, the unhappy. In all the world no voluptuousness flatters the senses more than social privilege.

"Out of the question. I'm not interested in your vagina, cover it up." He covered me, making me lie down, and said "All these little whores know is to flaunt their vaginas. Now I shall have to recover from that disgusting sight."
Within a budding grove, the girls think but of love. Hear the radio, drinking tea and to hell with being free. They've no idea the bourgeoisie has never hesitated to kill its children.
[last lines]
[two young male guards are dancing with each other]
What's your girlfriend's name?
Marguerita.
Dear friends, marrying each other's daughters will unite our destinies for ever.

I remember I once had a mother too, who aroused similar feelings in me. As soon as I could, I sent her to the next world. I have never known such subtle pleasure as when she closed her eyes for the last time.
The limit of love is always needing an accomplice!
Idiot, did you really think we would kill you? Don't you see we want to kill you a thousand times, to the limits of eternity, if eternity could have limits?
The obscene gesticulation is like deaf-mute's language, with a code none of us, despite unrestrained caprice, can transgress.
"Without bloodshed, there's no pardon. Without bloodshed."

[singing]
On the bridge of Perati, there flies a black flag, the mourning of the Julian regiment that goes to war. On the bridge of Perati, there flies a black flag. The best young men lie under the earth.
Signora Vaccari is sure to soon turn them into first class whores. Nothing is more contagious than evil.
Homage to the rear temple is often more fervent than the other.
without bloodshed, there is no forgiveness. Without bloodshed. Baudelaire.
